high_descs: Turn to the right and face the blue towel on the floor.
Pick the blue towel up from the floor.
Go right and cross the room to stand in front of the table to the right of the bed and night stand that has a lamp on it.
anns.task_desc: Pick up a towel and turn a light on.

high_descs: Turn right to face the rag on the floor.
Pick up the rag on the floor.
Turn around, bring the rag to the desk next to the bed.
Turn on the lamp on the desk.
anns.task_desc: Examine the rag by the light of the lamp on the desk.

high_descs: Turn right towards the blue cloth on the floor.
Pick up the cloth from the floor.
Turn around and walk forward to the lamp on the desk at the other end of the room.
anns.task_desc: Examine a blue cloth by the light of a desk lamp.
